snippet: Rescuers found more than 30 survivors on Monday in southwestern China after an earthquake killed at least 398 people and injured more than 1,800.
abstract: Rescuers find more than 30 survivors in aftermath of earthquake that has rocked southwestern China; quake has killed at least 398 people, injured more than 1,800 and destroyed 12,000 homes.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers found more than 30 survivors on Monday in southwestern China after an earthquake killed at least 398 people and injured more than 1,800.
